thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: South Africa's Eskom to launch own probe into SAP contract

author: Reuters Editorial
title: South Africa's Eskom to launch own probe into SAP contract
text:
JOHANNESBURG, March 8 (Reuters) - South Africa’s state-run power utility Eskom said on Thursday it would launch its own probe into a contract with German software maker SAP which has ensnared the company in a wider graft scandal.
SAP said on Thursday it had found compliance breaches and “indications of misconduct” in public sector deals in South Africa involving the Guptas, friends of former president Jacob Zuma accused of corruption.
Both Zuma and the Guptas have denied any wrongdoing. (Reporting by Ed Stoddard Editing by Joe Brock)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
